scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../client && npm run lint && cd ../
scripts.start: npm run install:server && cd server && npm run start:heroku
scripts.install:dependencies: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.buildclient: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.deploy: cd client && npm run build && git add -A :/ && git commit -m 'deployment of client' &&  git push
